extensionDescription.message: AI-powered tweet suggestions with different tones

popupTitle.description: The title of the popup window.

popupLogoAlt.description: Alt text for the logo image in the popup.

themeToggleLabel.description: Accessibility label for the theme toggle button.

welcomeDescription.message: Enhance your social media presence with AI-powered tone suggestions that make your tweets stand out.
welcomeDescription.description: Welcome description paragraph in the popup.

aiFeatureHeading.description: Heading for AI features section in welcome

videoFeatureHeading.description: Heading for video features section in welcome

howItWorksHeading.description: Heading for the 'How it works' section.

step1Description.message: Begin writing your tweet in the Twitter composer

step2Description.message: Click the floating wand icon that appears

step3Description.message: Choose a tone that matches your intention

styleCorrection.description: Style option for correcting text grammar and spelling

styleParaphrase.description: Style option for paraphrasing text without specific tone

errorRefreshExtension.message: Magic Tweet extension needs to be refreshed. Please reload the page.
errorRefreshExtension.description: Error message asking user to reload page for the extension.

errorReloadToRestore.message: Please reload the page to restore the extension.
errorReloadToRestore.description: Error message asking user to reload page to restore extension after an issue.

toneSelectionPanelHeader.description: Header for the tone selection panel.

loadingSuggestions.description: Text shown while suggestions are loading.

errorPrefix.description: Prefix for displaying an error message.

tryAgainButton.description: Text for the try again button.

errorMissingInfo.description: Error message when text or tone is missing for suggestion generation.

errorNoSuggestions.description: Error message when the generation process produced no suggestions.

errorFailedSuggestions.description: Generic error message when suggestion generation fails.

errorNoSuggestionsAvailable.description: Error message displayed in the panel when no suggestions can be shown.

errorRateLimitExceeded.message: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait a moment and try again.
errorRateLimitExceeded.description: Error message when the API rate limit is exceeded.

errorTwitterRateLimit.message: Twitter API rate limit reached. Please try again in a few minutes.
errorTwitterRateLimit.description: Error message specifically for Twitter API rate limiting.

errorTooManyRequests.message: Too many requests. Please wait before trying again.
errorTooManyRequests.description: Error message for general rate limiting.

errorRetryLater.message: Service temporarily unavailable. Please retry in a few moments.
errorRetryLater.description: Error message when service needs retry later.

defaultSuggestionTone.description: Default tone name used if a specific tone isn't provided for a suggestion.

copiedButton.description: Text shown on the copy button after success.

copyFailedButton.description: Text shown on the copy button after failure.

guidanceOpenPopupToLogin.message: Please open the extension popup to log in.
guidanceOpenPopupToLogin.description: Guidance message shown when user needs to authenticate

loginRequiredMessage.description: Main message when login is required

loginButtonText.description: Text for button that opens the extension popup for login

errorDisplayingSuggestions.description: Error message shown if suggestions cannot be displayed in the UI.

errorMissingParams.description: Error message when required parameters (text, tone) are missing.

errorApiKeyMissing.description: Error message shown when the OpenAI API key is not configured.

errorInvalidApiResponse.description: Error message when the API response structure is unexpected.

errorParseSuggestions.description: Error message when suggestions could not be parsed from the API response.

languageToggleLabel.description: Accessibility label for the language toggle button.

aiProviderHeading.description: Heading for the AI Provider selection section in the popup.

aiProviderOpenAI.description: Label for the OpenAI radio button option.

aiProviderXAI.description: Label for the XAI (Grok) AI provider option.

aiProviderGemini.description: Label for the Gemini AI provider option.

loggedInMessage.message: You are logged in with Twitter.
loggedInMessage.description: Message shown when the user is authenticated with Twitter.

logoutTwitter.description: Button text to logout from Twitter.

loggedInAsUser.description: Message shown with the user's Twitter handle. $USERNAME$ is a placeholder.

errorExtensionNeedsReload.message: Magic Tweet had an issue. Please try reloading the extension from its settings, or reload this page.
errorExtensionNeedsReload.description: Error shown when the extension's context is lost and it likely needs a reload.

checkingStatus.description: Button text when checking login status.

suggestionsRemainingText.description: Text displayed next to the number of AI suggestions the user has left.

suggestionsRemaining.description: Label for the suggestions remaining statistics in the user profile card.

videoDownloadsRemaining.description: Label for the video downloads remaining statistics in the user profile card.

loadingUserInfo.description: Message shown when loading user profile information

roastDescription.message: Get 5 creative roasts of your tweet
